sec.title: Elena Ojea
sec.p: is a Research Fellow at University of Vigo (Spain). Her research interests include adaptation to climate change in socio-ecological systems, ecosystem services, and economic instruments.

sec.title: Isaac Pearlman
sec.p: is a conservation biologist at US Peacecorpsin Philippines. His research interests are fisheries and marine conservation, and climate adaptation planning.

sec.title: Steven D. Gaines
sec.p: is the Dean of the Bren School for Environmental Science and Management at UCSB. His research focuses on marine ecology and conservation, sustainable fisheries, the design of marine reserves, and the impact of climate change on ocean ecosystems.

sec.title: Sarah E. Lester
sec.p: is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Geography at Florida State University. Her research interests include the ecological effects of marine protected areas, sustainable fisheries management, and marine spatial planning.
